abstract: A look at the intense criticism Herman Cain has undergone this week over his economic plan. Also, campaign finance filings are due on Saturday.
snippet: A look at the intense criticism Herman Cain has undergone this week over his economic plan. Also, campaign finance filings are due on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: A look at the intense criticism Herman Cain has weathered this week over his economic plan. Also, campaign finance filings are due to the Federal Election Commission on Saturday.

headline.main: Caucus Video: Attacks on 9-9-9; Campaign Finance Preview
